comment: Probably my favorite teacher at spsu. If her class is open, take it. She is one of the coolest professors I have ever taken. She loves the subject and you will too! Never thought I'd love Irish lit but she makes you love it. Text books required but they're cheap. take this class!

I have always enjoyed English. This class was the best. Despite all the difficult times that Parker was going through, we still had fun. Buy ALL the books. You will need them. The tests were not only on things we read, but also on group presentations, so pay attention. Never though Irish lit would be so fun. Awesome prof. :D Would def take again.

This is a Brit Lit 2 course, but it is focused on the Irish lit. Let me tell you, I have never be interested in lit at ALL, but this class made me what to continue reading Irish Lit. Teacher is easy and fair. Come to class early, so you don't miss a POP QUIZ(S). You do have to buy books and used them(question come from the books). ENJOY THE CLASS!

If not the best teacher for any Eng class then she is in the top 2. She makes class fun by having a group discussion over the material assigned. As long as you participate and actually read the assignments/turn them in on time you'll pass with an A/B

Most fun college literature class I've had. Like all literature classes, READ. Literally, the rest will be like going down-river and the material is interesting: IRISH Literature. Not the same things you've been reading, something new and really interesting. She'll be there to ask questions as well, so if you don't see the specifics, just ask!
Down to earth. Enjoyable Class, Enjoyable professor.

Interesting and entertaining class. She wants you to write what you think and feel. No holding back. She grades mostly on the effort and thought behind the paper; grammar is only considered when it gets distracting. No textbook! Tells you exactly how it is and what she expects. Shows a great deal of respect which earns her a great deal in return.
Great class, very helpful an easy B.

Radio Free Bubba is in the library, but its only a few dollars.  The other book for the class you will never touch.  Show up, do your work, and don't slack on the group project and you'll make an enjoyable A.
Very good with class, keeps things interesting.  First year the school taught Irish Lit.  Shes extremely happy and gung ho to do the job.  Very passionate professor.  i will never will forget Yeats!

Had for American Lit 2. She is really good professor. I am not a reader by any means and she actually picked a good book for our novel. i enjoyed it. Good professor. Yous hould get an A if you do all the work (notecards, etc). No textbook, but you need to get the novel(s).
The note cards and letters to your partner get really old.  She says she doesn't believe in test.  The journal at the end of every book is an easy A if you have done all your note cards and letters.

AWESOME! You'll definitely work hard for your grade, but trust me when I say that it won't really feel like "work." She genuinely wants you to write what you're thinking without worrying about grammar or being politically correct. You'll enjoy the class and if you turn in your work on time and show up. Contract Grader. RECOMMENDED! TAKE HER!!!!!!
Ms Parker is an awesome teacher. Her portfolio assignments are very helpful. There is some work you have to do, but you will feel good about your writing.
Great teacher. Taking her again for 1102!
SHE IS AWESOME.U WANT LEARNHOW TO WRITE ESSAYS THEN TAKE HER.SHE CHANGED MY APPROACHED TOWARDS WRITING.HIGHLY SUGGEST YOU TAKE HER.
nice teacher, funny, and somtimes she can go off topic. but my main point is not to be fooled she is not hot, pretty but not hot.
Fun and easy class
nice teacher and fun to be in the class...its always fun
No Comments

One of my favorite teachers I've ever had. The class was a lot of fun, a fair amount of work was involved but none of it was busywork. Takes a refreshingly different approach to english class. Highly recommend taking her classes if you have the chance.
yea i agree with spsugirly, awesome teacher, i was not expecting the best year when i first met her but she turned out being cool
Very fun, nice, and fair professor. Class isn't boring AT ALL.
